dict.acceptation: （持续地）苦干；（驾舟时）拍打（水面）；（心脏）狂跳；脚步沉重地走（或跑）；
连续重击；捣碎，碾碎；强迫吸收；猛烈袭击；

sent.orig: He focuses on Pound's poetry itself instead of his personality, attempting to keep objective.
sent.trans: 他重点研究Pound的诗歌本身、而不是Pound的性格，以试图保持客观态度。

sent.orig: His study offers a fresh sight of Pound s work.
sent.trans: 他的研究为Pound的作品提供了新的视角。

sent.orig: Pound s achievement could hardly be reached by later poets.
sent.trans: Pound的成就是后来的诗人们很难达到的。

sent.orig: It would take a long time for Pound s generation to fully understand him.
sent.trans: Pound的同时代人还需要很长时间才能彻底理解他。

sent.orig: B. A (Pound pound) of apples costs about English (Pound, pound).
sent.trans: 一磅苹果大约值一英镑。
